channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1

item.title: Verizon just had a big outage. Here's what we know
item.description: Verizon says a software problem caused the glitch and they are conducting a postmortem, but experts say outages are "a fact of life" these days.

item.title: There's an internet blackout in Iran. How are videos and images getting out?
item.description: Starlink is illegal in Iran, but people are still using the satellite internet service to get around the government's internet shutdown.
